001package ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net;
002
003/**
004 * Immutable representation of a captured link-layer frame.
005 *
006 * @param data raw frame bytes; defensively copied
007 * @param timestampMicros capture timestamp in microseconds since epoch
008 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
009 */
010public record RawFrame(byte[] data, long timestampMicros) {
011  /**
012   * Creates a raw frame snapshot while defensively copying payload data.
013   *
014   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
015   */
016  public RawFrame {
017    data = data != null ? data.clone() : new byte[0];
018  }
019}
